title: image in mail by dado
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:info-ayers
|lang=en[!-- EN/RU/KO/CN/FR/PL/ES/TH/JP/DE/IT/UA/PTBR --]
|page=image-in-mail-by-dado[!-- url of your page on the scp wiki --]
|authorPage=http://www.scp-wiki.wikidot.com/machen2[!-- link to your author page --]
|comments=
= **image in mail by dado**
 
-----
 
A little story I wrote, another dado one. The entire idea for this came from [[*user Doctor Cimmerian]], big thank you to him, check out his stuff [/dr-cimmerian-s-personnel-file here]. Thanks to [[*user AnAnomalousWriter]], [[*user HarryBlank]], [[*user Impperatrix]] and [[*user Tstaffor]] for their always appreciated critique! 

-----
 
= **Image Credits**
-----
The image is an edited version of lookcloser.png, taken from SCP-5000, created by [[*user Tanhony]], and is under CC BY SA 3.0.
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:rso]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:bhl-dark-sidebar]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
**From:** [[[dado-hub|meisdado@dadomail.com]]]
**To:** [[[secure-facility-dossier-site-300|vrequet@scp.net]]]
------
[[=]]
[[image dadoislookcloser.png width="95px"]]
[[/=]]
you is buy fine dado chowder. 
[[/div]]
@@@@
[[div class="blockquote"]]
**From:** vrequet@scp.net
**To:** meisdado@dadomail.com
------
What? 
[[/div]]
@@@@
[[div class="blockquote"]]
**From:** vrequet@scp.net
**To:** meisdado@dadomail.com 
------
Who is this?
[[/div]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
**From:** meisdado@dadomail.com
**To:** vrequet@scp.net
------
yes, you is spoken to dado. sry for typhoons, uppercase key broken.
[[=]]
[[image dadoislookcloser.png width="95px"]]
[[/=]]
you is buy fine dado chowder. 
[[/div]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
**From:** vrequet@scp.net
**To:** meisdado@dadomail.com 
------
.....Your IP Address is a broken egg. 
What do you want? Why are you sending me that image? 
[[/div]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
**From:** meisdado@dadomail.com
**To:** vrequet@scp.net
------
dado is blackmailing you, no? yes dado learnt it from very fine customer also internet, it no working? 
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 130%]]**YOU HAVE BEEN BLOCKED BY {{vrequet@scp.net}}**[[/size]]
[[/=]]
